rules.purpose: Generate Angular unit test code for components
instructions: Use Jasmine & Karma (Angular default) for unit tests.
Test DOM rendering, inputs, outputs, and event handlers.
Keep tests clean, avoid redundant boilerplate.
Ensure functional coverage for UI logic.
Write code directly inside the corresponding *.spec.ts file.

rules.purpose: Generate visually stunning Angular component templates and styles
instructions: Use Bootstrap 5 classes for layout and styling.
Enhance visuals with SCSS (hover, shadows, spacing, transitions).
Apply changes directly to component.html and component.scss files.
Avoid inline styles in TypeScript files.
